name: QUEEN
lore:
The young girl that moves with Phantom Thieves.
She has the power to use her PERSONA powers however she sees fit. The codename QUEEN is used to disguise her true identity. Even behind a mask, you can sense her temperament.
''For more information on Queen, click here.''
{{ClearSpace}}
skill1lvl1: QUEEN summons [[w:c:megamitensei:Johanna|Johanna]] and rides it, spinning around at highspeed to generate a Nuclear Tornado. The tornado sucks enemies in towards its center, dealing 60% AoE damage 7 times with a final attack which deals 200% AoE damage. QUEEN cannot be attacked while the effects of her Ultimate ability occurring.
skill2lvl1: QUEEN summons Johanna which deals 250% AoE damage to all enemies in front of it and also generates a nuclear effect which lasts for 5 seconds. If an enemy suffers 2 Critical Strikes, while the effect is active, they shall be stunned for 2 seconds. Enemies can be stunned multiple times while the nuclear effect is occurring.
skill4lvl1: QUEEN’s Crit Rating is increased by 6% and her Defense Rating is increased by 20% every 10 seconds. This ability can be stacked.
skill4lvl2: QUEEN’s Crit Rating is increased by 8% and her Defense Rating is increased by 25% each time her attributes are increased.
skill4lvl3: QUEEN’s Crit Rating is increased by 10% and her Defense Rating is increased by 30% each time her attributes are increased.
engravings30description: Enhance the ability Attack & Defend, QUEEN's Crit Rating is increased by 10% and her Defense Rating is increased by 35% each time her attributes are increased.
engravings302star: Reach 2 Star Ascended with this hero to gain: CBR +3
engravings303star: Reach 3 star Ascended with this hero to gain: CBR +3
engravings60description: Enhance the ability Ms. Post-Apocalyptic Raider, Damage is increased to 220%.
engravings604star: Reach 4 Star Ascended with this hero to gain: CBR +3
engravings605star: Reach 5 Star Ascended with this hero to gain: CBR +3
engravings80description: Arena of Heroes, Legend's Challenger Tournament, Legends' Championship, Heroes of Esperia: AS +16.67 CBR +10
siskilldescription: QUEEN is granted a shield which exists for 5 seconds and has a value equal to 25% of her max health every time Johanna is summoned by any of her abilities.
siskill10unlocks: [+10 Unlocks] Shield has a value equal to 30% of QUEEN’s max health.
siskill20unlocks: [+20 Unlocks] Shield has a value equal to 35% of QUEEN’s max health.
siskill30unlocks: [+30 Unlocks] QUEEN gains an additional 25% Crit Rating and 30 Crit Amplification points while the shield exists.
furniture3description: [3/9 Mythic Pieces] When QUEEN attacks an enemy that is being controlled, herself and nearby allies are healed for 40% of the attack’s damage value.
furniture9description: [9/9 Mythic Pieces] QUEEN heals herself and her allies, while also increasing her and her allies’ Attack Ratings by 30% for 3 seconds. This ability cannot be stacked.
